epic_description: Enable customers to select items from the menu, add to cart, and place orders online with an order confirmation system.

user_stories.title: View Menu and Item Details
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to be able to browse the menu and view details for each item so I can make informed decisions about my order.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am on the homepage, When I navigate to the menu, Then I should see a list of available items categorized appropriately.
Given I am viewing the menu, When I click on an item, Then I should see detailed information about the item, including name, description, price, and available customizations (e.g., size, toppings).
Given I am viewing the menu, Then menu items are displayed with clear images (where available) and concise descriptions.

user_stories.title: Add Items to Cart
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to be able to add items to my cart so I can collect all desired items before placing my order.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am viewing an item's details, When I click the 'Add to Cart' button, Then the item should be added to my cart with the selected quantity.
Given I have items in my cart, When I view the cart, Then I should see a list of the items I've added, their quantities, and the subtotal.
Given I have items in my cart, When I change the quantity of an item, Then the cart subtotal should update automatically.
Given I have items in my cart, When I remove an item from my cart, Then the item should be removed, and the cart subtotal should update automatically.

user_stories.title: Checkout and Order Placement
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to be able to proceed to checkout, provide my contact and payment information, and place my order.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have items in my cart, When I click the 'Checkout' button, Then I should be directed to the checkout page.
Given I am on the checkout page, Then I should be able to enter my contact information (name, email, phone number).
Given I am on the checkout page, Then I should be able to select a payment method (e.g., credit card, PayPal).
Given I have provided all required information, When I click the 'Place Order' button, Then my order should be submitted successfully.

user_stories.title: Order Confirmation and Tracking
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to receive an order confirmation after placing my order so I know it has been received and is being processed.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have placed an order, Then I should receive an order confirmation email or on-screen message with my order details and estimated delivery/pickup time.
Given I have placed an order, Then I should be able to track the status of my order online.
Given I have placed an order, The confirmation displays the order number, date, time, items ordered, total amount and delivery address(if applicable)

steps: Verify that the menu items are displayed.
test_cases.expected_results: A list of available menu items, categorized appropriately, is displayed.

steps: Click on a specific menu item.
Verify that the item details are displayed.
test_cases.expected_results: The selected item's details, including name, description, price, and available customizations, are displayed.

test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing an item's details.
test_cases.expected_results: The selected item is added to the cart with the default quantity. The cart displays the item and current subtotal.

test_cases.preconditions: User has items in the cart.
steps: Change the quantity of an item in the cart.
Verify that the cart subtotal is updated.
test_cases.expected_results: The cart subtotal is automatically updated to reflect the changes in item quantity.

test_cases.preconditions: User has items in the cart.
steps: Verify the checkout page is displayed
test_cases.expected_results: User is redirected to the checkout page. The checkout page displays the order items and total amount.

test_cases.preconditions: User is on the checkout page and has filled out all the required information
test_cases.expected_results: The order should be placed successfully without any errors.

test_cases.preconditions: User has successfully placed an order.
steps: Check for an order confirmation email.
Navigate to the order tracking section (if available).
test_cases.expected_results: User receives an order confirmation email with order details and estimated delivery/pickup time. User can track the status of the order online.

test_cases.preconditions: User has successfully placed an order.
steps: Verify on-screen message after placing order
test_cases.expected_results: An on-screen confirmation message displays the order number, date, time, items ordered, total amount and delivery address(if applicable).
